title: Forty T-206 Phillies for Sale (incl. scarce backs)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Forty T-206 Phillies for Sale (incl. scarce backs)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc S.
Looking to sell as a group.  Scans of all card available upon request.  Looking for $1,895 - or best offer.
